justification: Good read that Team B lacks RB depth and targets injured/committee upside; offering a doubtful Tier 2 RB plus a committee back aligns with those tastes. It also states Team A’s consolidation goal. However, it underrates Jordan Rivera’s Tier 1 value and overestimates B’s acceptance; a 7-1 team may prefer elite consolidation over a 2-for-1. Rationale is brief and doesn’t cite playoff schedule/O-line factors B values. Trade is plausible but light for Rivera.
